Function Documentation

int32_t CSL_cbassErrClearIntr ( const CSL_cbass_errRegs *  pErrRegs,
uint32_t  intrMask 
)

Clear interrupts of CBASS Error reporting module.

Parameters
pErrRegsPointer (of type CSL_cbass_errRegs *) to the base address of the CBASS error reporting module.
intrMaskInterrupts to clear.
Returns
status CBASS error module clear interrupt status CSL_PASS: success CSL_EBADARGS: failure, indicate the bad input arguments

uint32_t  intrMask 
)

Parameters

intrMaskInterrupts to disable.
Returns
status CBASS error module disable interrupt status CSL_PASS: success CSL_EBADARGS: failure, indicate the bad input arguments

int32_t CSL_cbassErrReadStaticRegs ( const CSL_cbass_errRegs *  pErrRegs,
CSL_CbassErrStaticRegs *  pStaticRegs 
)

This API is used to read static registers of CBASS QoS module. This API needs to be called after the initial configuration is done and hence mutliple read between static registers do not change the values.

Parameters
pErrRegsPointer (of type CSL_cbass_qosRegs_ep *) to the base address of the CBASS QoS module.
pStaticRegspointer to static registers to be read ref CSL_CbassErrStaticRegs
Returns
CSL_PASS - success CSL_EBADARGS - API fails due to bad input arguments
int32_t CSL_cbassErrSetDestID ( const CSL_cbass_errRegs *  pErrRegs,
uint32_t  destId

destIdDestination ID
Returns
status CBASS error module set destination ID status. CSL_PASS: success CSL_EBADARGS: failure, indicate the bad input arguments
